ComicInfo.Summary: Strangers Die Every Day; (Sanctuary Book One: Deathmonks - Chapter Five): While Vido meets with the Mayor to try to secure funding for his special unit seeking Sanctuary assassins, Lusiphur carries out his first assignment.
